class.name: LPortal
class.brief_description: LPortals allow visibility from room to room in the Cyclops visibility system.
class.description: When building a level, portals are simply MeshInstances that should be a convex polygon facing outward from a room, that cover a window or doorway. They should be named with the prefix 'portal_' followed by the name of the room they lead to. e.g. 'portal_lounge'.

members.member: The room that the portal will link to.
This can allow turning on and off visibility through e.g. doorways at runtime, as doors are closed.
